storage.append: Append string data to a new or existing file.
storage.appendBuffer: Append a buffer to a new or existing file.
storage.exists: Return true if the file already exists.
storage.read: Read contents of file as a string.
storage.readAsBuffer: Read contents of file as a buffer.
storage.remove: Delete a file, or do nothing if it doesn't exist.
storage.size: Return the size of the file, or -1 if it doesn't exists.
